facts.text: Refero features real-life products in its design library.
Refero offers a variety of page types including Dashboard, Product Page, and Landing.
Refero includes UX patterns like Testimonials and Filter & Sorting.
Refero's primary call to action is 'Start Exploring'.
Refero has a presence on Product Hunt with 34 reviews.
Refero's target audience includes UI/UX designers and creative professionals.
